Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class PointCounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.controller.PointCounter
  • public class PointCounter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to handle all the methods for calculating the points

      • calculateTurnPoints

        public void calculateTurnPoints()
        This method will cycle through all dead players and assigns points for the kills

      • calcDmgList

        private java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> calcDmgList​(int playerId)
        Parameters:
        playerId - dead player
        Returns:
        a list ordered by players who did dmg to the dead player, from top to lowest

      • calcGamePoints

        public void calcGamePoints()
        This function will calculate the killShotTrack Points

      • convertKillShotTrack

        private java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> convertKillShotTrack()
        This function will translate the killShotTrack from alist of skull in a list of playerIds and will keep count of overkill as double kills
        Returns:
        a list of player Ids in which every id is a kill performed by the correspondent player

      • sortArrayListByPlayerIdOccurrences

        private java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> sortArrayListByPlayerIdOccurrences​(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> list)
        Parameters:
        list - is a list of id w/ multiple occurrences
        Returns:
        a list of ids ordered by the occurrences of them in the input list

      • assignPoints

        private void assignPoints​(int[] actualPointVect,
                          java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> sortedPlayerList)
        This method will assign points in the Model
        Parameters:
        actualPointVect - is an int vector containing the point to assign to players in relation on their position in the sorted player list
        sortedPlayerList - is an ordered list of player ids

        public void setFrenzyForTest​(boolean frenzyForTest)

        Parameters:
